Committee of Public Accounts Use of AI in Government

The Committee of Public Accounts examines the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in government. The report discusses the current membership and powers of the committee, which are set out in House of Commons Standing Orders.

Key Concepts:

  • Examining public expenditure and appropriation
  • Powers and responsibilities of the Committee of Public Accounts
  • Use of AI in government: current state and future prospects
  • The need for more technical roles within the profession
  • Digital-first operating model and its benefits
  • Assessing employment models and competitiveness of digital staff packages
AI Government Committee of Public Accounts digital transformation digital skills gap AI adoption
